name: Scared Brothers-GMTK Jam 2021
description:
In this game, you have to play as two brothers tied with a rope. The second of them is very shy, and if he is near danger, he will try to escape. Can you escape the dungeon in such chaos?

How to play:

  • Use mouse for clicking in menu.
  • WASD - brother moving.
  • The red circle indicates how far the brother can get scared from
  • get to the blue light at the end of each level
